TopicTitle: Naming the 0.90 update - "On at the ninety"?

Articles.Content:
My suggestion for a name for the next update would be "On at the ninety"

It was a callout during the last stages of descent and landing for the space shuttle when following the heading alignment circle for lineup with the runway. Seems like a very fitting name for the update to me.

For reference:

http://youtu.be/Xtfnl_KOuCM?t=3m35s

Hmm. I kinda like it. Not just because of the update number, but we are also getting updated mk. 3 spaceplane parts for .90, which were suppose to be replica shuttle parts.

EDIT: Now that I watch the video, I see how the shuttle's aileron wing is shaped like one of the new swept wings in the game. Hmm... (Incoming inspiration)

Edited October 16, 2014 by Yellowburn10

It's a bit early to start this, I'm sure Squad will open a thread or survey for suggestions, as they have done with the last two versions

Thread closed.
